item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. PostgreSQL High Availability Solutions – Part 1: Jepsen Test and Patroni (128 points | 28 comments)
27. Ask HN: Does retro computing make you feel younger or older? (5 points | 3 comments)

30. Unique killer whale pod may have acquired special skills to hunt whale sharks (49 points | 35 comments)
